channel.title: Daily Video Games Digest
channel.description: Quick daily updates on the biggest video game announcements, sales data, player milestones, and reviews. Hosted by Dany Waksman and powered by AI.
channel.itunes:author: Dany Waksman

item.title: April 23 - Gaming News Digest
item.description:
Gaming news highlights summarized by Dany Waksman.
- The New Google Streamer 4K Has Dropped in Price for the First Time Ever: https://www.ign.com/articles/google-streamer-4k-deal-2025 - The Last of Us' Latest Episode Had a Special Voice Cameo From Ellie's Original Voice Actor, Ashley Johnson: https://www.ign.com/articles/the-last-of-us-latest-episode-had-a-special-voice-cameo-from-ellies-original-voice-actor-ashley-johnson - AU Deals: Score the Lowest Prices on The Last of Us 2, LEGO, Horizon, and LEGO Horizon!: https://www.ign.com/articles/au-deals-score-the-lowest-prices-on-the-last-of-us-2-lego-horizon-and-lego-horizon - The Last of Us season 2, episode 2: The biggest changes between the HBO show and the PlayStation game: https://www.gamesradar.com/entertainment/drama-shows/the-last-of-us-season-2-episode-2-the-biggest-changes-between-the-hbo-show-and-the-playstation-game/
